Title: Save the Squirrel!
Plot: The Wonder Pets receive a call from a squirrel who is trapped on a ferris wheel at Coney Island. When they free the squirrel from the wheel, they discover that it seems to be lost, but is reluctant to ask for help. They enjoy the delights of Coney Island as they try to persuade the squirrel.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
